ddr, i love how fast you bring rips out and the video is abs spot on..The problem is with the audio..Most of the rips, dialogues are at a low volume, but when the background music starts, the volume escalates to v.high levels. it may not be so noticeable while watching it on the computer. But take the rip into a home theater and the sound blasts in background music that you have to keep adjusting the vol between dialogues and background music..Thanks so much nevertheless for the rips. Hope we can have this sorted as someone pointed out as well..
